system.effect: Requires vessel to have component that offers cargo storage. If vessel is targeted by Focused Augury, identifying cargo requires 4 DoS. Additional +50 Achievement Points for Criminal Endeavours. Reduce Morale by 2 and -10 to repair attempts. Poor Version has -15 to repair, Good has -5, Best has -5 and +75 Achievement Points. Only one per vessel.
